Key Match Events: Mujeeb Ur Rahman clean bowled Pathum Nissanka with a delivery that had to be seen to be believed
Dhananjaya de Silva crafted a brilliant half-century to guide Sri Lanka home
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gulbadin Naib had a comical dismissal
Others: Afghanistan's tournament is over, with Friday's clash against hosts Australia now their final chance to earn a victory at the T20 World Cup
Sri Lanka rise to third in the Group 1 standings and will need to defeat England on Saturday - and have other results go their way - to have any chance of sneaking in
